com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.controller.components

Class BlockTrackerMember

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.controller.components.BlockTracker
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.controller.components.BlockTrackerMember

  • public class BlockTrackerMember
extends BlockTracker
    Keeps track of the active rails, signs and detector regions below a MinecartMember. This tracker is routinely updated by the BlockTracker of the MinecartGroup.
